typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Cust_Number as double,
		Location as string,
		Profit_Center as string,
		Addtnl_Credit as double,
		Last_Review_date as integer,
		Next_Review_Date as integer,
		Terms_of_Payment as short,
		Terms_of_Delivery as short,
		Username as string,
		Maint_Date as date,
		CL_Code as string,
		AR_Accounting as string,
		Cust_Language as string,
		Status as string,
		Type as string,
		Group as string,
		Overdue_Days as short,
		Allowance_Amt as double,
		Order_Stop_Control as string,
		Supplier as string,
		Cust_Sub_Type as string,
		Sales_Transport_Type as string,
		Credit_Limit as double,
		Ins_Policy_Num as string,
		Ins_Effect_Date as short,
		Ins_Exp_Date as short,
		Direct_Debit_Flag as string,
		CO_OP_Switch as string,
		CO_OP_Cust_Num as short,
		Green_Dot_Credit_Switch as string,
		LOC_2 as string,
		Cust_Abrev_Name as string,
		VAT_Exempt_Flag as string,
		Stat_Country as short,
		Stat_State as short,
		Stat_Town as short,
		Stat_Village as short,
		Oil_Tax_Override_Code as double,
		DD_tran_Type as string,
		Clean as string,
		Samples as short,
		Salesman_Num as short,
		Sale_Region as string,
		Cust_Area_Code as short,
		Insured_Risk_Limit as double,
		Euro_Switch as string,
		Contact_Phone as string,
		Contact_Name as string,
		Contact_Name_2 as string,
		Contact_Name_3 as string,
		Contact_Fax as string,
		Contact_Fax_Ext as string,
		IDT_Override as string,
		PRT_Reminder as string,
		Remind_Lang_SW as string,
		Book_Date as string,
		Cycle_Group_Code as string,
		Broker_Flag as string,
		EDI_Invoicing_Sw as string,
		Outsort_Code as string,
		Adcred_Eff_Date as short,
		Adcred_End_Date as short,
		Insur_Cust_Vend as short,
		VAT_Retention_Sw as string,
		EDI_Sales_Inv_Sw as string,
		Print_Driver as string,
		OB10_Flag as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(processed_datetime = currentTimestamp(),
		each(match(endsWith(lower(name),'_date')||endsWith(lower(name),'_ccyymmdd')), $$ = toDate(toString($$),'yyyyMMdd')),
		Addtnl_Credit = toDouble(Addtnl_Credit),
		Allowance_Amt = toDouble(Allowance_Amt),
		Credit_Limit = toDouble(Credit_Limit),
		Oil_Tax_Override_Code = toDouble(Oil_Tax_Override_Code),
		Insured_Risk_Limit = toDouble(Insured_Risk_Limit)) ~> TransformedColumns
TransformedColumns sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		Cust_Number as string,
		Location as string,
		Profit_Center as string,
		Addtnl_Credit as decimal(12,2),
		Last_Review_date as timestamp,
		Next_Review_Date as timestamp,
		Terms_of_Payment as string,
		Terms_of_Delivery as string,
		Username as string,
		Maint_Date as timestamp,
		CL_Code as string,
		AR_Accounting as string,
		Cust_Language as string,
		Status as string,
		Type as string,
		Group as string,
		Overdue_Days as string,
		Allowance_Amt as decimal(12,2),
		Order_Stop_Control as string,
		Supplier as string,
		Cust_Sub_Type as string,
		Sales_Transport_Type as string,
		Credit_Limit as decimal(14,2),
		Ins_Policy_Num as string,
		Ins_Effect_Date as timestamp,
		Ins_Exp_Date as timestamp,
		Direct_Debit_Flag as string,
		CO_OP_Switch as string,
		CO_OP_Cust_Num as string,
		Green_Dot_Credit_Switch as string,
		LOC_2 as string,
		Cust_Abrev_Name as string,
		VAT_Exempt_Flag as string,
		Stat_Country as string,
		Stat_State as string,
		Stat_Town as string,
		Stat_Village as string,
		Oil_Tax_Override_Code as decimal(7,4),
		DD_tran_Type as string,
		Clean as string,
		Samples as string,
		Salesman_Num as string,
		Sale_Region as string,
		Cust_Area_Code as string,
		Insured_Risk_Limit as decimal(12,2),
		Euro_Switch as string,
		Contact_Phone as string,
		Contact_Name as string,
		Contact_Name_2 as string,
		Contact_Name_3 as string,
		Contact_Fax as string,
		Contact_Fax_Ext as string,
		IDT_Override as string,
		PRT_Reminder as string,
		Remind_Lang_SW as string,
		Book_Date as timestamp,
		Cycle_Group_Code as string,
		Broker_Flag as string,
		EDI_Invoicing_Sw as string,
		Outsort_Code as string,
		Adcred_Eff_Date as timestamp,
		Adcred_End_Date as timestamp,
		Insur_Cust_Vend as string,
		VAT_Retention_Sw as string,
		EDI_Sales_Inv_Sw as string,
		Print_Driver as string,
		OB10_Flag as string,
		CreatedOnUTC as timestamp,
		CreatedBy as string,
		{__dl_processed_DT} as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError',
	outputRejectedData: true,
	rejectedData_container: 'loggingcontainer',
	mapColumn(
		Cust_Number,
		Location,
		Profit_Center,
		Addtnl_Credit,
		Last_Review_date,
		Next_Review_Date,
		Terms_of_Payment,
		Terms_of_Delivery,
		Username,
		Maint_Date,
		CL_Code,
		AR_Accounting,
		Cust_Language,
		Status,
		Type,
		Group,
		Overdue_Days,
		Allowance_Amt,
		Order_Stop_Control,
		Supplier,
		Cust_Sub_Type,
		Sales_Transport_Type,
		Credit_Limit,
		Ins_Policy_Num,
		Ins_Effect_Date,
		Ins_Exp_Date,
		Direct_Debit_Flag,
		CO_OP_Switch,
		CO_OP_Cust_Num,
		Green_Dot_Credit_Switch,
		LOC_2,
		Cust_Abrev_Name,
		VAT_Exempt_Flag,
		Stat_Country,
		Stat_State,
		Stat_Town,
		Stat_Village,
		Oil_Tax_Override_Code,
		DD_tran_Type,
		Clean,
		Samples,
		Salesman_Num,
		Sale_Region,
		Cust_Area_Code,
		Insured_Risk_Limit,
		Euro_Switch,
		Contact_Phone,
		Contact_Name,
		Contact_Name_2,
		Contact_Name_3,
		Contact_Fax,
		Contact_Fax_Ext,
		IDT_Override,
		PRT_Reminder,
		Remind_Lang_SW,
		Book_Date,
		Cycle_Group_Code,
		Broker_Flag,
		EDI_Invoicing_Sw,
		Outsort_Code,
		Adcred_Eff_Date,
		Adcred_End_Date,
		Insur_Cust_Vend,
		VAT_Retention_Sw,
		EDI_Sales_Inv_Sw,
		Print_Driver,
		OB10_Flag,
		{__dl_processed_DT} = processed_datetime
	)) ~> sink
